title: Configuration Screen
description: Used by drivers and applications to display a form to the user, asking for configuration.

title.description: Usually displayed as the top title bar

subtitle.description: Usually displayed next to or below the title

sections.description: These sections should be rendered as field sets or groups

actions.description: When submitting, all fields in all sections are sent in the reply.

data.description: This property is used to store any data that should be returned with a reply.
